sn21.5:1.2: Atha kho āyasmā sujāto yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami.
sn21.5:1.3: Addasā kho bhagavā āyasmantaṁ sujātaṁ dūratova āgacchantaṁ.
sn21.5:1.6: yañca abhirūpo dassanīyo pāsādiko paramāya vaṇṇapokkharatāya samannāgato, yassa catthāya kulaputtā sammadeva agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajanti tadanuttaraṁ brahmacariyapariyosānaṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharatī”ti.
